page.title: Privacy Policy
page.subtitle: We care about protecting your personal data

privacy.intro_text: We, the EthioDirect team, respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect information.
privacy.collection_text: We collect only the information necessary to process orders and improve our service: name, phone, email, shipping address.
privacy.usage_text: Your data is used for: order processing, communication with you, sending newsletters (only with your consent). We do not share data with third parties, except for delivery and payment services.
privacy.security_text: We use modern encryption standards and secure connections (HTTPS) to keep your data safe.
privacy.contact_text: If you have any questions about this policy, please email us at hello@ethiodirect.ua
